fullDescription.intro: Reshapes an output to the specified shape. Corresponds to the Keras Reshape Layer.

tab.name: Options
tab.option: The name prefix of the layer. The prefix is complemented by an index suffix to obtain a unique layer name. If this option is unchecked, the name prefix is derived from the layer type.
Tuple of integers defining the target shape.

ports.inPort: The Keras deep learning network to which to add a Reshape layer.
ports.outPort: The Keras deep learning network with an added Reshape layer.
